requirements.summary: Revert all frontend files to their Version 6 state, removing all changes from versions 7-11
acceptanceCriteria: All frontend files match their Version 6 state exactly
No remnants of versions 7-11 remain in the codebase
Application renders and functions as it did in Version 6
All Version 6 routes and components are restored

file_operations.description: Restore the index.html file to its Version 6 state, reverting any HTML structure, meta tags, or script references that were changed in versions 7-11
Restore the main.tsx entry point to its Version 6 state, reverting any changes to providers, imports, or initialization logic introduced in versions 7-11
Restore the App.tsx root component to its Version 6 state, reverting routing configuration, layout structure, and any component composition changes from versions 7-11
Restore the LandingPage component to its Version 6 state, reverting any content, layout, or functionality changes made in versions 7-11
Restore the AssessmentPage component to its Version 6 state, reverting any form fields, validation logic, submission handling, or UI changes from versions 7-11
Restore the AppLayout component to its Version 6 state, reverting any structural or composition changes made in versions 7-11
Restore the AppHeader component to its Version 6 state, reverting any navigation, branding, or styling changes from versions 7-11
Restore the AppFooter component to its Version 6 state, reverting any content, links, or styling changes made in versions 7-11
Restore the Disclaimer component to its Version 6 state, reverting any text, styling, or functionality changes from versions 7-11
Restore the WatermarkGuard component to its Version 6 state, or delete if it did not exist in Version 6
Restore the useActor hook to its Version 6 state, reverting any changes to actor creation, authentication handling, or query invalidation logic from versions 7-11
Restore the useInternetIdentity hook to its Version 6 state, reverting any changes to authentication flow, identity management, or delegation handling from versions 7-11
Restore the useQueries hook to its Version 6 state, reverting any changes to mutation logic, query handling, or backend integration from versions 7-11
Restore the socialLinks configuration to its Version 6 state, reverting any changes to URL validation or environment variable handling from versions 7-11
Restore the index.css file to its Version 6 state, reverting any Tailwind configuration, CSS variables, theme colors, or custom styles added in versions 7-11
Restore the root index.css file to its Version 6 state, reverting any global styles, Tailwind directives, or CSS variable definitions changed in versions 7-11
Restore the Tailwind configuration to its Version 6 state, reverting any theme extensions, color definitions, animation keyframes, or plugin configurations added in versions 7-11
Restore the backend type definitions to their Version 6 state, reverting any interface changes, type additions, or enum modifications from versions 7-11
Remove the generated hero image as it was not part of Version 6
Remove the generated icons image as it was not part of Version 6
Remove the generated logo image as it was not part of Version 6
